name: Type a Latte
description:
A basic cafe-themed typing game with a memorization element to it. 

Still in development.

For now, your goal is to earn money and make customers happy by typing their name and order correctly! There is a shop to buy some upgrades if you want to spend your money.

This game is keyboard controls only - use W/S or UP/DOWN or TAB to navigate menus. ESC will bring up a pause menu (when playing). 

Known bugs/issue: 1) input fields for typing sometimes has an extra space in the beginning, and 2) sometimes the last character won't delete.

If you notice any other bugs, or have feedback in general, feel free to use this anonymous form: https://forms.gle/1WLWtXNEbp3k2PM88.
